title: Vasa Small Parallelogram Sculpture
description:
Some years ago, Sculptor Vasa Velizar Mihich developed methods of sculpting with cast acrylic forms. Perfecting his technique over time, the artist has created a stunning, vibrant vocabulary all his own. Be sure to observe from every angle. Vasa and his team create each piece by hand in Los Angeles CA. Signed by the artist.

  • Dimensions: 3.5 x 1.25 x 6.5 in.

*Please note that due to the handmade nature, each product may vary in design/look/appearance.
